name="block">Blocks.LEAVES#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Oak trees don't have roots</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">8</field><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_surface_water_depth"><field name="depth">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how deep the water can be for the tree to generate. If the value is 0, the tree will never be submerged</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING_NO_LEAVES</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">We check that the tree doesn't generate in the wrong biome</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.TALLGRASS#1</field><field name="block1">Blocks.GRASS</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="mcitem_allblocks" x="823" y="141"><field name="value"></field></block><block type="placement_count" x="276" y="332"><comment pinned="false" h="105" w="222">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. We try to place 4 trees in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">1</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter" x="908" y="305"><comment pinned="false" h="93" w="207">This placement checks if the given condition is true. If it isn't, the feature isn't placed. Otherwise, the next placement modifiers are processed</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_has_sturdy_face"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="direction">UP</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We check if the block below the current position has a solid face UP</comment></block></value></block><block type="block_holderset_tag" x="751" y="508"><field name="tag">minecraft:dirt</field></block><block type="block_predicate_is_air" x="357" y="611"></block><block type="mcitem_allblocks" x="691" y="604"><field name="value"></field></block><block type="block_holderset_list" x="-605" y="730"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="block0"></field><field name="block1"></field></block><block type="placement_rarity" x="1005" y="731"><field name="rarity">5</field><comment pinned="false" h="129" w="182">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. If this condition isn't passed, the feature won't be placed</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.GRASS</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block><block type="placement_heightmap" x="485" y="784"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block or liquid</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">Finally, we check that the feature isn't outside of the biome. This placement modifier should always be the last one.</comment></block></next></block><block type="mcitem_allblocks" x="89" y="937"><field name="value"></field></block><block type="feature_ore" x="131" y="951"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="size">33</field><field name="discardOnAirChance">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="141" w="272">This block represents a feature for dirt "ore". Underground dirt blobs can only replace natural stone blocks. Ores should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_ORES generation stage.</comment><value name="target0"><block type="ore_target"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">If the target block is one of the overworld base stones, replace it with dirt</comment><value name="target"><block type="rule_test_tag_match"><field name="tag">base_stone_overworld</field></block></value><value name="state"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">Blocks.DIRT#0</field></block></value></block></value></block><block type="block_holderset_tag" x="-9" y="975"><field name="tag">minecraft:dirt</field></block><block type="block_predicate_is_air" x="-386" y="996"></block><block type="placement_count" x="285" y="1148"><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="224">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. First, we repeat the feature 7 times on every chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">7</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how many times the feature is repeated.</comment></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_uniform"><comment pinned="false" h="84" w="208">We then set the height of the feature. This ore feature generates with a uniform distribution between 0 and 160</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">160</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">Finally, we check that the feature isn't outside of the biome. This placement modifier should always be the last one.</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_random_patch_simple" inline="false" x="-605" y="1290"><field name="tries">96</field><field name="xzSpread">7</field><field name="ySpread">3</field><comment pinned="false" h="122" w="245">This block represents a block patch feature. The blocks will only generate in valid positions (for example, grass will never generate on a stone block). Patches of plants should be generated during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">Blocks.BROWN_MUSHROOM</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being placed.</comment></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"><comment pinned="false" h="72" w="251">This condition is checked for every block that is being placed. Here we don't want the mushrooms to replace other blocks</comment></block></value></block><block type="placement_rarity" x="-605" y="1401"><field name="rarity">256</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is so the patch only generates in some of the chunks. The higher the value, the rarer the patch will be</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="165">We then move the patches at the highest motion blocking block, so that they generate on the surface</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
